title: Steps to Solving
text: Solve the first equation for $$y$$ and then substitute the resulting expression into the second equation.

title: Solving for $$x$$
text: To solve for $$x$$, factorize the quadratic.

title: Zero Product Property
text: Use the Zero Product Property to find the value of $$x$$ from each of the factors.

title: Solve for $$y$$
text: To solve for $$y$$, substitute each value for $$y$$ into the first equation of $$3x-y=-2$$ to solve for $$y$$.
